text_original: Best tuner I've had in years I tried two different Snark tuners, and they were not very accurate.  I gave them away.  This little tuner has worked very well for me for the past year; it's small and can stay on the neck of my mandolin and can tune either by vibration or sound, and is quite accurate.  Very good tuner IMO.

text_original: Great quality, quite small and unobtrusive Using on a desk for web meetings. Great quality, quite small and unobtrusive. Captures nearby audio very clearly, minimal echo/ambient noise. Not good for a large room unless you have multiple (and an audio mixer or the ability to use multiple sources with your software).
